article_title: Israel cancels US talks after UN Gaza ceasefire vote
sentence: Israel  believes  Hamas  and  its  allies  are  still  holding  about  130  hostages  in  Gaza,  including  33  presumed  dead.

article_title: Israel cancels US talks after UN Gaza ceasefire vote
sentence: The  hostages  were  seized  when  Hamas  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people,  most  of  them  civilians.

article_title: Israel cancels US talks after UN Gaza ceasefire vote
sentence: "It  has  taken  six  months,  over  100,000  Palestinians  killed  and  maimed,  two  million  displaced,  and  famine,  for  this  council  to  finally  demand  an  immediate  ceasefire,"  he  said.
